name: Spooky Woods (LD48)
description:
Travel deeper and deeper into the corrupted forest using your spirit powers to traverse platforms and avoid enemies.

Play with mouse/keyboard or controller (tested with PS4 and Xbox controllers):

  • space - jump
  • shift - dash in air
  • q - form shift (to pass through obstacles)
  • a/d - movement

For browser fullscreen is recommended!

Created for Ludum Dare 48 by Harry, Kirby (kgc00) and Patrick (langep)
